organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: " As one of the world 's most externally oriented economies , Singapore has a disproportionately large stake in the WTO , " said Desmond Supple , economist at research house I.D.E.A .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Organization" entities:

1. World Trade Organization (WTO)
2. International. Development Economics (I.D.E.A)

Explanation:

1. World Trade Organization (WTO): The WTO is an international organization that promotes free trade and economic cooperation among its member countries. It is mentioned in the paragraph as one of the entities that Singapore has a stake in.
2. International Development Economics (I.D.E.A): I.D.E.A is a research house that specializes in economic research and analysis. Desmond Supple, the economist mentioned in the paragraph, works at this organization.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to "Organization" in the paragraph:

1. World Trade Organization (WTO)

Explanation:

* World Trade Organization (WTO): The WTO is an international organization that promotes free trade and economic cooperation among its member countries. It is mentioned in the paragraph as one of the entities that Singapore has a stake in.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
